message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15000 to you. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to propose a special introductory price of $14000. This offer is exclusive to you and includes a 1-year warranty and personalized support. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if there's any way I can assist you further. Looking forward to your positive response.
